messages.content:
Suppose you are a user of a dialog system or conversational agent. Please generate 3 synthetic spoken queries related to movies to the dialog system. Please identify all named entities occurred that belong to one of the following entity types:
[Title, Viewers' Rating, Year, Genre, Director, MPAA Rating, Plot, Actor, Trailer, Song, Review, Character].
Please list such named entities with the corresponding entity types on the following line, in the order of occurrence.

Here are some example queries and annotations for your reference. Please follow this format.

Examples:

Query: "how many movies came out in 2004"
Named Entities: [2004 (Year)]

Query: "when did mark joffe direct the bounty hunter film that is rated pg"
Named Entities: [mark joffe (Director), bounty hunter (Plot), pg (MPAA Rating)]

Query: "what type of movie genre is the perfect weapon"
Named Entities: [the perfect weapon (Title)]

Query: "is cary grant in any historical films that are a must see"
Named Entities: [cary grant (Actor), historical (Genre), must see (Viewers' Rating)]

Query: "show me a movie with the song a whole new world"
Named Entities: [a whole new world (Song)]

Query: "what movie is considered the funniest of all time"
Named Entities: [funniest of all time (Review)]

Query: "could you show me some part of the new indiana jones movie"
Named Entities: [some part (Trailer), indiana jones (Character)]


---

Additionally, the generated spoken movie queries should follow the requirements below:
1. The query should inquire about Movie showtimes and ticket availability;
2. The user should be impatient.
